title: The Allegory of Dusk
description: Life most definitely is not fair, and at times, it is harsh. What happens when the worst occurs in our life— when there’s no guarantee of redemption or of hope? When there is no ending in sight to what we go through when the bottom has dropped out? When everything we’ve hoped for, everything we have planned for has been ripped away painfully?"The Allegory of Dusk" is an examination of the reality of life at its most painful and damaged.
author: Amber Jerome~Norrgard
